name: MUWAT Kentucky Fired Cured Flying Pig
additionalNotes:
Debuted officially at the 2014 IPCPR, expected to hit the shelves in October; presented in twelve count boxes, with the same dos capa, a Brazilian Matafina capa for the latter half, and a dark fire capa for the first half. Pig tail cap. 
KFC: Kentucky Fired Cured
